DB::error: Table 'megaplay.jos_votes_game_results' doesn't exist
SELECT games.*, grate.votes_average FROM jos_games  as games LEFT JOIN jos_votes_game_results as grate on grate.obj_id=games.id  WHERE state=1 ORDER BY grate.votes_average DESC
LIMIT 10
